topic: Use of randomness in scientific discovery and its applications in energy technology
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling prompts can lead to novel insights and creative breakthroughs by generating unexpected combinations. As a next step, I will experiment with randomly rearranging my current set of prompts and document any new questions or ideas that emerge. This exercise will help identify patterns or themes that consistently lead to innovative thinking.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
